entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] System.Security.Tests failing on macOS with link errors #76498
  • AV under coreclr!GlobalStringLiteralMap::AddStringLiteral #76494
    8.0.0
  • In Xamarin Forms, NetInterface.NetworkInterfaceType always return a value of 0 on Android. #76493
  • Intermittent build failure in AfterSourceBuild: "Could not write state file" #76488
  • Update src/tests infra to use `DOTNET_`-prefixed environment variables #76484
    Future
  • Consider removing security object info from GCInfo #76482
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #76478
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Lazy api #76403
  • `xunit.extensibility.execution 2.4.2-pre.22` - ` primary signature's signing certificate is not trusted by the trust provider.` #73646
    8.0.0
  • Reference to static data with ROSpan not kept in register #12241
    Future
  • Operations on halfs of a Vector256 #76066
    8.0.0
  • Linguistic apostrophe does not work with DateOnly.TryParseExact #76413
    Future
  • Allow model-binding error messages to be customised #41408
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Attempt to fix native AOT with CryptoKit #76499
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #76497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert change in AddInternedString #76496
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LinuxBionic] Disable RemoteExecutor during test runs #76495
  • Lower `GetLower` nodes formed from `GetElement(0)` #76492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not transform SIMD field access into HWIs in minopts #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security
  • Re-enable DynamicGenerics test on OSX #76489
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete security object from GCInfo encoder/decoder #76487
    area-VM-coreclr
  • block port# 5060 and 5061 #76485
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make CodeSnippets tests more pluggable #76479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Introduce a WASM JIT for interpreter opcodes #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [interpreter] Treat methods with the Intrinsic attribute as if they have AggressiveInlining set #76475
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, MonoInterpreter=true
  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • Reinstate strict prototypes warning #76463
    community-contribution
  • Fix SuperPMI unit test error checking #76411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fix potential division by zero in fgopt.cpp #76424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement ChaCha20Poly1305 with CryptoKit on macOS #76317
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • JIT: allow forward sub of QMARK nodes #76476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py #76472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve early bail-out logic in GCInfoDecoder #76359
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid internal register allocation when possible for PUTARG_SPLIT #76443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DEBUG/non-DEBUG SuperPMI asm diffs #76470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `IDispatchImplAttribute` API #76416
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Use System.CommandLine (v2) in dotnet-pgo #76467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Split runtime-extra-platforms into distinct pipelines #76328
  • Remove .dll from Interop.Libraries.HostPolicy for consistency with other runtime libraries #76466
    area-Host
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • JIT: A small CQ improvement for Equals/StartsWith unrolling #76439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] EmccExtraExportedRuntimeMethods MSBuild property #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimisation on compiling problem #1859
  • Linker warnings on OSX #956

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: support FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Allow cast from i1 to i8 #2006

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add void to .c functions that have no parameters - something about K&R functions?? #2004
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: cast unsigned ints to floats using uitofp #1994

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet new should have a --force-english-output switch #28287
  • Idea: Support "dotnet run"ning single source files without a project file. #12328
    Discussion
  • Enable publishing for a RID with `PublishRuntimeIdentifier` #26444

PullRequests

Created

  • apicompat: attribute changed on right must only be emitted in strict mode #28290
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • don't issue diagnostic when virtual is removed from member in sealed type #28278
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2008848 #27667

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` on `linux-musl-s390x` #64423
  • CodeLens reports method references for unselected targets #64422
  • Getting CS8168 and CS8350 in .NET 7 RC1 for code that compiled on .NET 7 preview 7 and .NET 6 #64421
  • extract interface (vb) does not handle commented code correctly #64419

Closed

  • API proposal: represent `ref` fields and `scoped` parameters and locals #61647
    17.4
  • Update `SymbolDisplay` to include `scoped` for parameters and locals #63208
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Add symbol key tests #64420
    Area-IDE
  • Change wording so to pass Accessibility Insights #64418
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64417
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64415
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64428
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64427
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #64426
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #64425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use save all, instead trying to get dirty indicator #64403
    Area-IDE
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StartupAnalyzerTest tests are not running and all have test failures #44306
  • Blazor WASM : IServiceProvider Reflection based Property Getter Exception #44301

Closed

  • Blazor InputFile read updated file stream will throw InvalidOperationException #44277
  • Best practice to use IResult in a class library #44250

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44309
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Add warning on FallbackHref property #44307
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9080381` to `93f08be` #44303
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9080381` to `93f08be` #44302
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x

Merged

  • Fix typo link in aspnetcore docs readme #44308
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9080381` to `93f08be` #44305
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Fix route parameter completion provider including names that are already used #44275
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2009172 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • fix dotnet#43523 HttpSys Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #44144
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove use of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #43380
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Update static file docs and log if WebRootPath is not found #44296
    area-runtime
  • Add schema in launchSettings.json files #44295
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fixes unhandled exception on trace if process cannot start #3409

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell.Background - Gradient does not work #10445
  • Development Guide not clear on required XCode Version #10444
  • 'dotnet restore' for maui repo fails on macOS #10443
  • System.NullReferenceException in ShellToolbarTracker.cs:58 #10442
  • A DateTime.ToString with CultureInfo("nb-NO") gives the wrong datetime string output on iOS #10441
  • Cannot build Xaml in Platforms/Windows folder #10440
  • error in start build not working show sdk error #10439
  • WebView Crashes #10438
  • Application.Current.OpenWindow() creates a redundant instance of WebView #10436

Closed

  • [Bug] "Live Visual Tree" doesn't work for a MAUI app on Windows, but works for a WinUI3 app #10339

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10437
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Remove unused and potentially conflicting feeds #10423
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
